post.text: A rally fit for a King. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Kody
comment.text: Wtf is this? Why do you got this moron up here who has nothing to do with the campaign. Is it becausr you couldnt actually find anyone who would show up without him being there? Youre a disgrace.

replies.author: Francis
replies.text: This is my response to Trump lovers. Only an idiot votes for an idiot. NEVER NEVER NEVER TRUMP!! DRAIN THE SWAMP WITH TRUMP IN IT. Trump is an evil, depraved, self-centered bigot who demeans vets, mexicans, muslims, gold star families, disabled, and women. I take anyone over Trump as he is a corrupt, dishonest billionaire who cheats little people in students and contractors. Picture a man who is out of touch with the people while sitting in his gold chair staring at his portrait funded by charity money. He has no interest in politics and he cant control his temper . Trump is so pathetic!! CLINTON ALL THE WAY and Im not even a Democrat.
